title: Rethinking Subscription LTV Drivers
summary: This page discusses how payment declines negatively impact subscriber lifetime value and offers insights into combating involuntary churn. It highlights the importance of a successful subscription billing operation and features a conversation with FlexPay's CEO about these challenges.
key_points: Payment declines are a major threat to subscriber lifetime value.
Understanding the psychology of payment declines is crucial for businesses.
FlexPay offers solutions to reduce credit card declines and improve revenue.
The page features a discussion on combating involuntary churn in subscriptions.
